text:
League 1
Nice - Reims streaming: where to see the match?
For this 12th day of Ligue 1, OGC Nice receives the Stade de Reims this Sunday, November 3, 2019. A meeting to follow in full on French television but also streaming.
03 Nov 2019, 05:15 by Hugo Deloraine



Alexis Claude-Maurice, Kasper Dolberg and Adam OunasAlexis Claude-Maurice, Kasper Dolberg and Adam Ounas side by side, main recruits of OGC Nice version Ineos.Icon Sport



Alexis Claude-Maurice- Previous club: FC Lorient- Transfer allowance: 13 million eurosIcon Sport



Adam Ounas- Naples- ‚Ç¨ 2.50 million paying loanIcon Sport



Stanley Nsoki - Paris Saint-Germain - ‚Ç¨ 12.5 million Icon Sport



Hichem Boudaoui- Paradou AC- ‚Ç¨ 4 M. Icon Sport



Kh√©phren Thuram- AS Monaco- Free transferIcon Sport



Kasper Dolberg - Ajax Amsterdam - ‚Ç¨ 20.50 million Icon Sport

Nice: all recruits of the transfer window 2019




Stade de Reims, fourth, makes a great start to the season. Nice, on the contrary, fifteenth, disappoints. After being eliminated in the Coupe de la Ligue last Wednesday against Le Mans (3-2 loss), Nice will want to recover on this twelfth day of Ligue 1. A meeting that will take place at the Allianz Riviera.







Where to watch the match streaming?




Vieira + 7 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

This match between Nice and Reims is broadcast live on television on Bein Sports 1 this Sunday, November 3 from 17h. But you can also watch this match live streaming video:

Either via the subscription service (so paying) beIN Sports Connect available on PC & Mac via an Internet browser (Firefox, Chrome, Safari, etc.) but also on iPhone, iPad, Android, Xbox One, PS4, Chromecast or Apple TV.
Either from iOS and Android applications and from your TV provider (ISP or pay per view like Canal +): Orange TV, SFR TV, MyCanal ...
